question: There are 196 third-graders at Pine Valley School. 53 of them are girls. On Friday, 3 third-grade girls and 7 third-grade boys were absent. How many third grade boys were at Pine Valley School on Friday?
answer:
Of the 196 third graders, 53 are girls, so 196 students - 53 girls = <<196-53=143>>143 boys.
On Friday there were 143 boys - 7 absent = <<143-7=136>>136 boys.
#### 136
